metadata.name: Powershell Defender Disable Scan Feature
metadata.comment: Detects requests to disable Microsoft Defender features using PowerShell commands

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-mppreference ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('set-mppreference '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disablearchivescanning ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disablerealtimemonitoring ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disableioavprotection ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disablebehaviormonitoring ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disableblockatfirstseen ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disablecatchupfullscan ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disablecatchupquickscan '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('$true')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' 1 '))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zglzywjszwfyy2hpdmvzy2fubmluzy')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rpc2fibgvhcmnoaxzlc2nhbm5pbmcg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kaxnhymxlyxjjagl2zxnjyw5uaw5ni')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rglzywjszufyy2hpdmvty2fubmluzy')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rpc2fibgvbcmnoaxzlu2nhbm5pbmcg')) OR lower('rpc2fibgvizwhhdmlvcm1vbml0b3jpbmcg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kaxnhymxlymvoyxzpb3jtb25pdg9yaw5ni')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), output.summary: Detects requests to disable Microsoft Defender features using PowerShell commands

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Possible administrative activity 2. Other Cmdlets that may use the same parameters References: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/defender/set-mppreference?view=windowsserver2022-ps, https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/d609799091731d83d75ec5d1f030571af20c45efeeb94840b67ea09a3283ab65/behavior/C2AE, https://www.virustotal.com/gui/search/content%253A%2522Set-MpPreference%2520-Disable%2522/files
